DOC.brief_summary: Thoracotomy is one of the most painful operation. Continuous thoracic epidural or paravertebral analgesia are gold standard for postoperative pain. But both techniques require skills. Spinal morphine is alternative simple method with less efficacy. Adding low dose ketamine during intraoperative may be helpful in postoperative pain relief.
DOC.brief_title: Ketamine Combination With Spinal Morphine for Post Thoracic Surgery Pain : A Randomized Control Study
